page.title: 01WILBERFOSS A CHANGING PLACE
page.content: Wilberfoss is a small but expanding village situated about 8 miles east of York on the A1079. Many new houses have been built in the past 10 years and this has changed the character of the place considerably. Whilst there are many people who have lived in Wilberfoss for most of their lives,an increasing number come to live here for much shorter periods and move on usually because of changes of occupation. There are few amenities in the village at present and most people travel to York or Pocklington for shopping, leisure and pleasure. Among the younger people in the village there is a feeling that more facilities need to be provided nearer at hand. Travel can be too expensive. Life in the country can have drawbacks!
